name: The Potion Shop - an LGBT story
name_original: The Potion Shop - an LGBT story
description:
You are Ryo, a guy that has a potion shop with his boyfriend, Aimer. Ryo is a great alchemist so he has to create some potions, but he is really anxious. Can you help him do those potions?

In this story game there are 4 potions that you can create, each one of them will show a different side of the characters. Enjoy the story, and try to remember all the correct potions to use to create a newer one!

#LoveisLove

CONTROLS

Mouse - Click and select the options.

TEAM

Gabriel Dias - Code and Writing.  https://twitter.com/gabrieldevbr
